content: starla mitts are knitted with 2 strands at a time working from a written pattern and charts the palm and the back of the mitten are the same thus there is no designated left or right make 2 and you have a pair yarn needed knit pick palette 100% wool fingering weight rainforest heather- main color mc 102 yds finnley heather- contrasting color cc 97 yds one size adult
